entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet STS version is shown as the LTS version #47865
  • Telemetry Data Not Sent for dotnet new Command #47862
  • ExponentialRetry Method Does Not Retry on Exceptions #47861
  • Handling of Duplicate References in Solution Files #47860
  • Should Throw Error When Adding Projects with the Same Name but Different Paths to Solution Folder #47859

Closed

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-35390: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #34510
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33126: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #33214
    Discussion
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33128: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #33211
    Discussion
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33135: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #33210
    Discussion
  • .net9 Seems to ignore Directory.Build.props (or Directory.Build.targets or D.Packages.props) #46840
  • Regression in dotnet publish using .NET 9 SDK 9.0.200 #47227

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47882
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move in-vertical manifest merging to new arcade package #47881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable TSA tools #47876
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adjust how we enable dac signing to get it working on VMR release branches #47875
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Simplify exit code logic for dotnet test (MTP) and consider no results correctly as "zero tests ran" #47874
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • `dotnet package list` command should restore first #47873
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove summary when failing, and double space #47872
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Don't exclude .app/ directories in .gitignore template #47867
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove `ForceDryRunSigning=true` on Mac & Linux signed builds #47461
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not show VS workloads from an old version Fixes #47794 #47809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update Skip attribute with issue link for unimplemented tests #47858
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable winforms tests #47870
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Reduce allocations #47843
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Enable binskim, policheck and tsa in SB diff and license pipelines #47868
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Process C# directives in file-based programs #47702
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Update to AwesomeAssertions #47611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make all the properties in StaticWebAssetEndpoint lazy #47833
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • simplify CreateTempSubdirectory #45633
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve Post-Build Signing Validation in the VMR #47744
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove nuget-client from non-SB VMR #47846
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Select the NativeAOT runtime pack as the target package when it's provided as part of the KnownILCompilerPack metadata #46611
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • dotnet CLI: Rename project and command sub-folders #47800
    Area-CLI
  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ignore generic type parameter names when matching #40359
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-add: Get project DefaultProjectTypeGuid #47661
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-CLI, Branch Lockdown, 9.0.5
  • Open Test1.cs in Visual Studio, not MSTestSettings.cs #47768
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
